mapper.sql: menu_id menuId, menu_name menuName, menu_icon menuIcon, menu_url menuUrl, up_menu_id upMenuId, is_use isUse, create_time createTime, order_num orderNum
mapper.insert: insert into menu (menu_id, menu_name, menu_icon, menu_url, up_menu_id, is_use, create_time, order_num) values (#{menuId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{menuName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{menuIcon,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{menuUrl,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{upMenuId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{isUse,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{createTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{orderNum,jdbcType=INTEGER})

insert into menu
menu_id,
menu_name,
menu_icon,
menu_url,
up_menu_id,
is_use,
create_time,
order_num,

mapper.update:
update menu
menu_name = #{menuName,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
menu_icon = #{menuIcon,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
menu_url = #{menuUrl,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
up_menu_id = #{upMenuId,jdbcType=INTEGER},
is_use = #{isUse,jdbcType=INTEGER},
create_time = #{createTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
order_num = #{orderNum,jdbcType=INTEGER},
where menu_id = #{menuId,jdbcType=INTEGER}

update menu set menu_name = #{menuName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, menu_icon = #{menuIcon,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, menu_url = #{menuUrl,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, up_menu_id = #{upMenuId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, is_use = #{isUse,jdbcType=INTEGER}, create_time = #{createTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, order_num = #{orderNum,jdbcType=INTEGER} where menu_id = #{menuId,jdbcType=INTEGER}
mapper.select:
select
from menu where 1=1
and menu_name like #{menuName}
order by createTime desc
